en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}


The item(s) that you requested are now available. They will be held for you until {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}


{{#loans}}

{{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}/{{request.servicePointPickup}}

  • {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}} {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}} Barcode: {{item.barcode}} Call number:{{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}

{{/loans}}

en.header: Library items checked out coming due
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}


These items that you have checked out will be due on {{loan.dueDate}}

{{#loans}}

{{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

{{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}} {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}} Barcode: {{item.barcode}} Call number:{{item.callNumber}{{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}

{{/loans}}

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}


The item(s) that you have checked out are overdue and have accrued fines as follows. The fine rate depends on whether the items were overdue from a normal loan or overdue from recall.


{{#loans}}

{{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}/{{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

  • {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}} {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}} Barcode: {{item.barcode}} Call number:{{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}} Due date: {{loan.dueDate}}

{{/loans}}

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}


The item(s) that you had checked out are more than 45 days overdue and presumed lost. You are being billed for replacement costs as listed.

{{#loans}}

{{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}/{{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

  • {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}} {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}} Barcode: {{item.barcode}} Call number:{{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}

{{/loans}}

en.header: Library items checked out are overdue
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}


These items that you have checked out are now overdue.


{{#loans}}

Title: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}. Barcode: {{item.barcode}} Call number: {{item.callNumberPrefix}}{{item.callNumber}}{{item.callNumberSuffix}} Due: {{loan.dueDate}}{{loan.dueDateTime}}

{{/loans}}

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}


The item(s) that you have checked out have been recalled and must be returned to the library by {{request.requestExpirationDate}}


{{#loans}}

{{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}/{{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

  • {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}} {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}} Barcode: {{item.barcode}} Call number:{{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}

{{/loans}}
